title: Episode 280: Pharrell Williams

title: Episode 279: Troye Sivan
description: “One Of Your Girls” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Troye Sivan is a singer and songwriter from Australia. He’s been nominated for a Golden Globe, two Grammys, and he’s won four of Australia’s ARIA awards. title: Zhamira Zhambrano Talks Finding Joy Through Her Music and Current Beauty Obsessions Presented By Ulta Beauty
